reasoning: Chronic pancreatitis incidence reported at ~1.5 per 100k person-years globally from multiple epidemiological studies. Prevalence ~5 per 100k due to chronicity and disease duration. Both metrics relevant for this chronic condition with progressive course.
source: Yadav D, Lowenfels AB. (2006). The epidemiology of pancreatitis and pancreatic cancer. Gastroenterology. 144(6):1252-1261
